DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify incidence of Chinese herb nephropathy in a medical center
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Drug-Induced Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This is a retrospective study, by computer screening, chart review and phone survey to find herbal nephropathy and determine the cause-relationship. Using ICD-9-CM code as a tool to screen the newly diagnosed ESRD in NTUH computer data base, and divided patients into those with underlying disease(s) that cause the renal failure and those without.
DOC.criteria: patient who was newly diagnosed as end stage renal disease who need dialysis started dialysis before 2000
